name: Main_Assembly_Process
description: Overall process for assembling and handling bearings, bearing housings, and pallets.

name: Grasp_Bearing_BRG
description: Acquire a bearing (BRG) from its initial position using the shared BRG/PLT clamp.

name: Open_BRG_PLT_Clamp
description: Open the clamp used for bearings and pallets.

name: Close_BRG_PLT_Clamp
description: Close the clamp used for bearings and pallets to secure the bearing.

name: Grasp_BearingHousing_BH
description: Acquire a bearing housing (BH) from its initial position using the shared BH/Assembly clamp.

name: Open_BH_Assembly_Clamp
description: Open the clamp used for bearing housings and assembled parts.

name: Close_BH_Assembly_Clamp
description: Close the clamp used for bearing housings and assembled parts to secure the bearing housing.

name: Place_BearingHousing_BH_To_RMC
description: Place the bearing housing (BH) into the Right Machining Center (RMC).

name: Place_Bearing_BRG_Into_BH_For_Assembly
description: Place the bearing (BRG) into the bearing housing (BH) in the RMC for press-fit assembly.

name: Grasp_AssembledPart_From_RMC
description: Retrieve the assembled part from the Right Machining Center (RMC).

name: Place_AssembledPart_To_LMC_TemporaryStorage
description: Transfer the assembled part to the Left Machining Center (LMC) for temporary storage.

name: Grasp_Empty_Pallet_PLT
description: Acquire an empty pallet (PLT) using the bearing-shared clamp.

name: Place_Pallet_PLT_To_Conveyor_CNV
description: Place the empty pallet (PLT) onto the designated station on the conveyor (CNV).

name: Grasp_AssembledPart_From_LMC
description: Retrieve the previously stored assembled part from the Left Machining Center (LMC).

name: Place_AssembledPart_To_Pallet_On_Conveyor
description: Precisely place the assembled part onto the pallet on the conveyor, completing the cycle.
